song_lyrics: Maraṇ āvyu ḍhūkaḍu, kālya āvashe kāḷ ajān... °ṭek
Aṇ samajyā auṣhadh kare re, rati ek rog na jāy;
Lokvāṇī urmā dharī re, goḷī jaḷmā ghoḷī ghoḷī pāy... Maraṇ° 1
Anna gaḷe nav ūtare re, khātā ūlaṭī thāy;
Ati vyādhi dukh dehmā re, khāsī shūḷ āve na khamāy... Maraṇ° 2
Sagā-sambandhī sahu maḷī re, bese gharne bā’r;
Aḍhār divasthī anna melyu re, ḍoso tan tajavā thayo tyār... Maraṇ° 3
Indrinā dev ūṭhī gayā re, vaikharī vāṇī bolāy;
Devānand kahe Hari vimukhno re, toy pāpī prāṇ na jāy... Maraṇ° 4
title: Pāmar nar na bhajyo Bhagwān

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-1098: Sadguru Devanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
